welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mumbai, the vibrant and bustling city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and delicious street food. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this enchanting city has to offer. Enjoy your time in Mumbai!

restaurants.address: FIFC Building (Opp Sofitel, BKC), Mumbai, Mahārāshtra

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights within India.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 45 minutes.
